metadata.title: CVE-2012-6685 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Nokogiri before 1.5.4 is vulnerable to XXE attacks

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-6685` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ruby-nokogiri - 1.6.1+ds-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ruby-nokogiri package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.6.1+ds-1').
